label: 百練抄
本: Five Mountains: The Rinzai Zen Monastic Institution in Medieval Japan . Harvard University Press . 1981
説明文: A chronicle beginning in the year 968 of Emperor Reizei's reign, ending in 1259 of Emperor Go-Fukakusa's era. The author of this work is unknown, but it was compiled from various sources sometime in the late thirteenth century. Its focus is overwhelmingly on conditions in the capital region.
